00060   struct DualCoverTreeMapEntry
00061   {
00063     CoverTree<MetricType, RootPointPolicy, StatisticType>* referenceNode;
00065     double score;
00067     double baseCase;
00069     typename RuleType::TraversalInfoType traversalInfo;
00070 
00072     bool operator<(const DualCoverTreeMapEntry& other) const
00073     {
00074       if (score == other.score)
00075         return (baseCase < other.baseCase);
00076       else
00077         return (score < other.score);
00078     }
00079   };
